review: I used to stream off of my Playstation or laptop with a hdmi it would take a while and didn't like to wait. The Google chormecast saves me time and is so easy to set up! I love this so much and showed it to my family, now we have 3 in the house! It'd great if you have a good phone so anything you watch on your phone can be streamed to your tv. I basically make my tv into a smart tv by these device.  The Only problem Is That My Sister Always changes What I'm Watching just to upset me.
